attributes.action: Theresa May NO single market OR any deals with the EU on immigration
attributes.additional_details: We demand article 50 to be triggered no later than December the 1st! The people have spoken and Theresa may MUST do what the people ask! no more waiting and no more delaying!
attributes.background: Theresa may has already gone against the wish of the 17.5 million people with her backsliding, we did not vote for a hand still in the door brexit! we demand FULL BREXIT no free movement & Australian points system CUT IMMIGRATION NOW we are FULL

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/154593 (no freedom of movement)

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131950 (points-based immigration)

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/162155 (invoke article 50 by the end of 2016)
